He reaches into his pocket and pulls out the Tasmanian Devil’s mouth. He reaches deep into the mouth, and “pulls” Taz right side out again. Taz spins, spits and slobbers. MR. CHAIRMAN (CONT’D) Now, which of your little animal friends shall I have him eat first? DJ realizes he has lost. He hands the diamond over.

dialogues.speaker: DJ
dialogues.text: I’m never buying anything from ACME ever again.

dialogues.speaker: MR. CHAIRMAN
dialogues.text: You won’t have much choice. Mr. Chairman turns to exit, only to find standing in his path one very angry Tweety bird. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: TWEETY
dialogues.text: Where do you think you're going? Mr. Chairman takes this in. He LAUGHS.

dialogues.speaker: MR. CHAIRMAN
dialogues.text: (laughs) Ooh, what will I do now? (gestures to Taz) Eat the birdy. Taz approaches Tweety, gnashing. DJ takes a chance: he runs, launches off a rock and flips over Mr. Chairman, plucking the diamond from above. DJ lands and points it at Tweety. Light strikes it. A blue beam shoots out and hits Tweety. The little bird glows blue. He staggers back, and falls over the edge.

dialogues.speaker: MR. CHAIRMAN, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Entertaining, if pointless. (to DJ) My diamond, please?

dialogues.speaker: DJ
dialogues.text: No problem. Say, did you know that birds descended from dinosaurs?

dialogues.speaker: A GIGANTIC YELLOW PTEROSAUR 197
dialogues.text: appears, flapping its wings. It has abnormally large eyes. The voice is DEEP and has REVERB, but is unmistakable.

dialogues.speaker: TWEETY PTEROSAUR
dialogues.text: You are a very bad man.

dialogues.speaker: MR. CHAIRMAN
dialogues.text: (nervously) Well, I try. Pterosaur Tweety swallows Mr. Chairman in one GULP. He SPITS out the diamond. Pterosaur Tweety looks at Taz. Taz backs away, Woody Allen-style, then turns tail and runs. Monkey Damien scampers up and jumps on DJ’s shoulder. The monkey “hugs” DJ’s head.

dialogues.speaker: DJ
dialogues.text: I love you, too, Dad. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: OMIT 198
dialogues.text: EXT. MONKEY PLAZA — LATER 199 DJ, with Tweety on his shoulder, hugs Kate as they walk along with Damian (everyone is back to normal). Tweety holds his stomach.

dialogues.speaker: TWEETY
dialogues.text: My tummy hurts.

dialogues.speaker: DJ
dialogues.text: Dad, this is Kate. Kate, Dad. Kate hands Damian her card.

dialogues.speaker: KATE
dialogues.text: We should have lunch sometime. Your franchise is growing a little stale. I can help. DJ pinches her affectionately. She laughs. Tweety burps. Behind them are Daffy and Bugs, both in less good moods.

dialogues.speaker: DAFFY
dialogues.text: (rubbing head) I can’t believe after all that, we had to throw the diamond in the lava just because it could bring about the downfall of mankind...

dialogues.speaker: BUGS
dialogues.text: I can’t believe Tweety got to waltz in at the end and be the hero.

dialogues.speaker: DAFFY
dialogues.text: Now you know how I feel.

dialogues.speaker: BUGS
dialogues.text: You know, Daffy, you’re right. From now on, you and I are going to be equal partners in this thing. No more second banana for you. Bugs extends his hand. Daffy reaches for it.

dialogues.speaker: DAFFY
dialogues.text: Thanks, pal, I appreciate- (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: A giant monkey statue lands on Daffy.

dialogues.speaker: KATE, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: That's a print. And a wrap! A horde of sycophants rush up to Bugs, throw a robe on him and spirit him away with neck rubs and fresh fruit. PULL BACK to reveal we are

dialogues.speaker: SFX
dialogues.text: The crew APPLAUDS and breaks down the set. On the sidelines, the actors who played the Warner Bros as well as the major Looney Tunes (even the formerly evil ones) all join in the celebration. DJ and Kate walk off together. They pass the real BRENDAN FRASER, who’s reading a copy of Mad Magazine with his caricature on the cover. DJ reenters frame and addresses Brendan.

dialogues.speaker: DJ
dialogues.text: Hey, remember me? I threatened your “manliness” so you got me fired?

dialogues.speaker: BRENDAN FRASER
dialogues.text: I’m sorry, man. I get a lot of people fired and... I just, I can’t place the face... DJ punches Brendan in the jaw, dropping him. DJ exits frame again. After a beat:

dialogues.speaker: DAFFY, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Hello? Help? PAN BACK to Daffy, still trapped under the stone monkey.

dialogues.speaker: DAFFY, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Key grip? The “real” Daffy strolls in, wearing a robe and sipping a soda. He indicates the crushed Daffy.

dialogues.speaker: DAFFY, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Stunt duck. A rack of lights falls on him. (CONTINUED)
